formattedAddress: 85 West St, New York, NY 10006, USA
adrFormatAddress: 85 West St, New York, NY 10006, USA

editorialSummary.text: Burgers & a long beer list offered in a classic diner-style room with gingham tablecloths.

originalText.text: They have a great deal from 4pm-7pm on certain days where some appetizers are half off and the milkshake is $5. My milkshake was really yummy and had real strawberries. The quesdillas were nicely seasoned and there were generous portions of sides, although there are only four. The slider burgers were out of this world, cheesy and greasy. The manager Johnson and staff are all very friendly. I will definitely be returning!

text.text: They have a great deal from 4pm-7pm on certain days where some appetizers are half off and the milkshake is $5. My milkshake was really yummy and had real strawberries. The quesdillas were nicely seasoned and there were generous portions of sides, although there are only four. The slider burgers were out of this world, cheesy and greasy. The manager Johnson and staff are all very friendly. I will definitely be returning!

originalText.text: This is the American burger experience.  A good variety of burger choices in a friendly atmosphere. I had the 3 mini burgers (“mini B’s”) and they were perfect.  Caesar salad was fresh and not too saucy. Fries were average... but the Coney Island Pilsner was the perfect beer for the meal. This burger bar is clean, lively, and very well managed with attention to detail. Excellent service from my man Chris and all of the staff were friendly. Just walk past the front desk of the Marriott New York Downtown and you’ll find Bill’s.

text.text: This is the American burger experience.  A good variety of burger choices in a friendly atmosphere. I had the 3 mini burgers (“mini B’s”) and they were perfect. Just walk past the front desk of the Marriott New York Downtown and you’ll find Bill’s.

originalText.text:
Vegan Breakfast - Oatmeal w/ Berries, Fresh Fruit side, Breakfast Potatoes.
I don't know if this is strictly vegan because the oatmeal could have been made with dairy milk. But at least they offer a breakfast a vegan can order and be reasonably sure they're ok. If in doubt, ask. Sometimes potatoes aren't cooked vegan-style either. But this is the best I could do, and it was tasty and filling. The night before I did go in there for a take-out Beyond Burger. There was no one at the hostess stand, but I saw a group of servers further in just standing around. So I went up to them to ask for a take-out order, and one told me to go back and wait at the hostess stand. So I did and after a few minutes someone came around. The Beyond Burger was very good, so were the fries. Just be sure to order it vegan-style so they take off the dairy.

originalText.text:
We ate out and drank here a good few times on our trip to New York. We managed to have 2 dinners (each time the burgers were lovely and very filling) and a breakfast (very large portions). The fries were extremely large portions at dinner time, could be shared by two people and alright to eat.
The atmosphere in the bar is fun, lots of sports on and different people around the bar.
Drinks weren’t overly expensive and for the good burgers and nice atmosphere i’d definitely recommend trying out bills if your in the area :))

originalText.text: Typical American bar, well decorated and with friendly service. We had the Ranch Hand burger and it was really very good. 100% recommendable. We also had the South Of The Burger, which was a little too spicy for our taste.
